name: Titanium.UI.iOS.WebViewConfiguration
summary: A collection of properties used to initialize a web view.

properties.name: allowsAirPlayMediaPlayback
properties.summary: A Boolean value indicating whether AirPlay is allowed.

properties.name: allowsInlineMediaPlayback
properties.summary: A Boolean value indicating whether HTML5 videos play inline or use the native full-screen controller.
properties.description: You must set this property to play inline video. Set this property to true to play videos inline. Set this property to false to use the native full-screen controller. When adding a video element to a HTML document on the iPhone, you must also include the playsinline attribute. The default value for iPhone is false and the default value for iPad is true.
properties.default: For iPhone false and for iPad true.

properties.name: allowsPictureInPictureMediaPlayback
properties.summary: A Boolean value indicating whether HTML5 videos can play picture-in-picture.

properties.name: mediaTypesRequiringUserActionForPlayback
properties.summary: Determines which media types require a user gesture to begin playing.

properties.name: preferences
properties.summary: The preference settings to be used by the web view.

properties.name: processPool
properties.summary: The process pool from which to obtain the Web Content process of view.
properties.description: When a web view is initialized, either a new web content process is created for it from the specified pool or an existing process in that pool is used.

properties.name: selectionGranularity
properties.summary: The level of granularity with which the user can interactively select content in the web view.

properties.name: suppressesIncrementalRendering
properties.summary: A Boolean value indicating whether the web view suppresses content rendering until it is fully loaded into memory.
